data.eml:eml: Observations on the biology of Afrotropical Hesperiidae (Lepidoptera). Part 7. Hesperiinae incertae sedis: grass and bamboo feeders

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cock, Matthew J. W., Congdon, T. Colin E. (2014): Observations on the biology of Afrotropical Hesperiidae (Lepidoptera). Part 7. Hesperiinae incertae sedis: grass and bamboo feeders. Zootaxa 3872 (4): 301-354, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3872.4.1
